quest.name: Treasure Cove
journal: Kefusan is looking you up and down.
objectives: With the chat mode in Say, enter “Is anyone around here?” to draw the spirit's attention.

dialogue.name: KEFUSAN
dialogue.text: Ah, an adventurer! You are just in time. Tell me, have you ever heard of Treasure Cove?

dialogue.name: KEFUSAN
dialogue.text: According to ancient legend, a Hingan pirate hid the entirety of his fortune away in a firth in the Ruby Sea─the value of which eclipses even the wealth of kings! While it is said no one has ever been able to locate its whereabouts, we think we may have found it!

dialogue.name: KEFUSAN
dialogue.text: To the south of here is small cove. Whenever we draw close to it, the winds begin to pick up and carry the angry cries of a man shouting: “Begone! Begone from here!” No doubt it is the spirit of the pirate, who continues to covet his treasures from beyond the grave.

dialogue.name: KEFUSAN
dialogue.text: That incredulous look─do you mean to say you do not believe my story? Well, you are more than welcome to go there and verify the veracity of my statement for yourself. If the voice does not scare you away, you might even be able to find the legendary treasure.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With the chat mode in Say, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase that contains the words “Is anyone around here?” to draw the spirit's attention.

dialogue.name: KEFUSAN
dialogue.text: If in your investigations you manage to uncover the legendary treasure, do be sure to bring it back to us!

dialogue.name: RIDDLEMAN02695
dialogue.text: (-Faint Voice-)Begone! You are scaring all the fish away!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The winds have carried to your ears the complaints of an angry Kojin.

dialogue.name: RIDDLEMAN02695
dialogue.text: (-Faint Voice-)Ugh! Why does everyone insist on bothering me so? When I finally think I am rid of them, they round up their friends and return to harass me some more! Begone! Begone with all of you!

dialogue.name: RIDDLEMAN02695
dialogue.text: (-Faint Voice-)<sigh> I will never get any fishing done at this rate...

dialogue.name: KEFUSAN
dialogue.text: You mean to say the voice we heard was only that of a Kojin fisherman? How disappointing!

dialogue.name: KEFUSAN
dialogue.text: <sigh> I shall be sure to inform the others and tell them to quit bothering the poor soul.

dialogue.name: KEFUSAN
dialogue.text: While I am sad that it is over, it was fun while it lasted. Should you ever learn anything more of the pirate king's treasure, do come back to share what you find!
